channel.title: Compiling help
channel.description:
hey guys i'm having a problem with my compiler on bulby 508 i need a compiling code or help the thing is that i downloaded JRE and JDK 6 u 17 and i have set the classpath's and path too this is my codes [CODE]CLASSPATH code is: C:Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_17\bin\[/CODE] [CODE]PATH code is: C:Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_17[/CODE] and my compiler code is.. [CODE]@echo off COLOR 08 title Your Paradise "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/CODE] and when i click compile it says [CODE]The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .[/CODE]
PLEASE HELP!!!

item.title: Compiling help
item.dc:creator: @ironforg2 ironforg2
item.description:
@ironforg2 wrote:

V1LL3:

Are you using a 317 server or a 508 server ?

508

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling help
item.dc:creator: @V1LL3 V1LL3
item.description:
@V1LL3 wrote:

Make sure you have the right path code.
I have C:/Program/Jdk/Jdk6_14/bin
But that might just be for the swedish versions…

I aint sure though…

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling help
item.dc:creator: @Nuggetdabest Nuggetdabest
item.description:
@Nuggetdabest wrote:

@echo off @echo wait codeusa source compiling cd ../src echo Compiling net.com.codeusa.net.codec "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/net/codec/*.java echo Compiling net.com.codeusa "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/*.java echo Compiling net.com.codeusa.model "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/model/*.java echo Compiling net.com.codeusa.model.update "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/model/update/*.java echo Compiling net.com.codeusa.model.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/model/items/*.java echo Compiling net.com.codeusa.model.misc "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/model/misc/*.java echo Compiling net.com.codeusa.model.combat "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/model/combat/*.java echo Compiling net.com.codeusa.io "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/io/*.java echo Compiling net.com.codeusa.io.packethandler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/net/packethandler/commands.java echo Compiling net.com.codeusa.net "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/net/*.java echo Compiling net.com.codeusa.util "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/util/*.java echo Compiling net.com.codeusa.world.mapdata "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/world/mapdata/*.java echo Compiling net.com.codeusa.world.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/world/items/*.java DONE DONE DONE DONE DONE DONE pause

Try that change _16 to _17 though

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling help
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Use this instead:

@echo off
javac ./*.java
pause

Read full topic

hey guys i’m having a problem with my compiler on bulby 508 i need a compiling code or help the thing is that i downloaded JRE and JDK 6 u 17 and i have set the classpath’s and path too this is my codes

CLASSPATH code is: C:Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_17\bin\
PATH code is: C:Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_17

and my compiler code is…

@echo off COLOR 08 title Your Paradise "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
and when i click compile it says

The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .

PLEASE HELP!!!
